summary: This mod got inspiration from my first weapon's mod so hope you enjoy it.
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to my mod this is not first time i made weapons mod but well i still a newbies there is very much thing to learn but i hope you enjoy this mod.

*DESCRIPTION****

This mod add a set of weapons to skyrim world which you can craft from forge and for little challenge i made 2 material which price is not so cheap at all.
Weapons type list:
*Sword
*Greatsword
*Spear
*Scythe (2-handed)
*Scythe (1-handed)
*War axe
*Battle axe
*Mace
*Warhammer
*Dagger
*Bow
New material:
Sunium
Moonium
Those 2 material can't be found anywhere so you can buy them from city merchant with high price as i said of course.
NOTCHED PICKAXE now have a unique look.

*NOTICE****

Cause i'm newbie so i don't know how to make a bow don't disappear when drop so please don't drop the bow.
For a little fix to bow problem it weight is set to zero so you don't need to worry about it weight anymore.
You can post problem of this mod to comment to let me see if it is possible for me to fix.
Please don't comment about my english problem thank you.

*THANK YOU****

Thank Gimp.
Thank Creation Kit.
Thank Nifskope.
Thank anybody who visit my mod.
author: congtuan999
